alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 16 at 6:49AM EST until November 20 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 feet in the most persistent lake snows. The highest end of the snowfall range is forecast to be over the northern half of the county...basically from the Watertown area and Fort Drum to Philadelphia. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Jefferson county. * WHEN...From 1 AM Friday to 1 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions will impact the Friday morning and evening commutes. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4390 7588 4428 7556 4395 7636 4399 7638 4433 7583 4415 7638 4302 7901 4281 7890 4259 7911 4290 7820 TIME Y22M11D18T0600Z-Y22M11D18T1200Z COORD...4385 7580 4412 7530 4422 7543 4386 7637 4426 7556 4433 7568 4397 7634 4440 7591 4415 7638 4300 7902 4253 7915 4295 7825 TIME Y22M11D18T1200Z-Y22M11D19T1200Z COORD...4266 7836 4330 7600 4348 7584 4369 7620 4270 7834 4274 7903 4232 7975 4199 7977 4200 7941 4222 7884 TIME Y22M11D17T0600Z-Y22M11D17T1800Z COORD...4376 7597 4425 7548 4388 7637 4429 7563 4399 7638 4415 7638 4306 7903 4281 7890 4249 7945 4264 7863 TIME Y22M11D18T0600Z-Y22M11D18T1200Z COORD...4388 7592 4425 7548 4431 7562 4399 7634 4434 7577 4418 7631 4310 7894 4281 7890 4255 7936 4286 7841 TIME Y22M11D18T1200Z-Y22M11D19T1200Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
